front.title: Applicability Statement for Provider Provisioned CE-based Virtual Private Networks

abstract.t: This document is an applicability statement for Provider ProvisionedCE-based IPsec VPNs, as discribed in [CEVPN]. This documentdescribes how provider provisioned CE-based approaches meet the keyrequirements that are outlined in the PPVPN Applicability StatementsGuideline document [ASGUIDE].
